channel.title: I can't compile my server
channel.description:
Hello, I've problems with compiling my server. I'm using Mod Allstar's Compiler. When I try to compile the server, it says: ''You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions link to download the newest JDK.''
Well, I already installed JDK from this link: http://java.sun.com/products/archive/j2se/6/index.html So I don't understand why the compiler says that I've not installed JDK, I'm 100% sure I did install JDK.
Can anyone help me please?
Thanks in advance. :)

item.title: I can't compile my server
item.dc:creator: @Allardx Allardx
item.description:
@Allardx wrote:

All thank you very much! I can finally compile my server, great support!

Read full topic

item.title: I can't compile my server
item.dc:creator: @muslim786 muslim786
item.description:
@muslim786 wrote:

wot u need to do is delete evertyhing in the compiler and put this in:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: I can't compile my server
item.dc:creator: @iwolfi iwolfi
item.description:
@iwolfi wrote:

what you need to do is right click on compile click edit and lets say it said 7 or 6 or 5 on the end… u change it to whatever java update u got and then it shud work

Read full topic

item.title: I can't compile my server
item.dc:creator: @DJ_Whizz DJ Whizz
item.description:
@DJ_Whizz wrote:

jarnohhh:

You have jdk 6 update 7 right? than open your compiler with notepad and change the 5 or 6 to 7

Exactly what I was going to say.

You downloaded the update: JDK 6 UPDATE 7. So now you need to try to compile, if your compiler still doesn’t work. Right-click on your compiler and click on ‘Edit’. Find on the document: ‘C:\Windows\Java(JDK VERSION)’ <-- change the numbe to your update, in other words: search DJ Whizz on the search and find my Compiler Fix tutorial for better details.

  • DJ Whizz

EDIT:
Or PM me

Read full topic

item.title: I can't compile my server
item.dc:creator: @Allardx Allardx
item.description:
@Allardx wrote:

Hello,
I’ve problems with compiling my server. I’m using Mod Allstar’s Compiler.
When I try to compile the server, it says:
‘‘You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions link to download the newest JDK.’’

Well, I already installed JDK from this link: http://java.sun.com/products/archive/j2se/6/index.html
So I don’t understand why the compiler says that I’ve not installed JDK, I’m 100% sure I did install JDK.

Can anyone help me please?

Thanks in advance.
